Question: On January 25, 2010, this person announced that he signed a production deal with Warner Bros.
Hints: This person married Suzanne Krajewski in 2001; their daughter, Nina, was born in 2003.
On October 7, 2008, this person released to the iTunes Store "Whatever You Like", a parody of the T.I.
Additionally, Cobain described this person as "a musical genius".
